definition: being of delicate or slender build, a deliberate discourteous act (usually as an expression of anger or disapproval), pay no attention to, disrespect
details:
adjective
- being of delicate or slender build
= synonyms: slender
- (quantifier used with mass nouns) small in quantity or degree
= synonyms: little
- lacking substance or significance
= example: lacking substance or significance
= synonyms: thin
noun
- a deliberate discourteous act (usually as an expression of anger or disapproval)
= synonyms: rebuff
verb
- pay no attention to, disrespect
= synonyms: cold-shoulder
